09:42 <orogor> hi  
09:42 <orogor> hello , my catlina logs barks about INFO  .a.DefaultAuthorizationManager - [admin] access has been denied for user [xwiki:XWiki.zzzzz] on [xwiki]: security checkpoint  
09:43 <orogor> as i understand macro are executed by the macro creator , but here , the superadmin can t manage the wiki , the manage box gives the macro error too  
09:43 <orogor>  even superadmin can t display macro and get this error  
09:44 <orogor> can i try to map directly the admin right to an ldap group ?  
09:46 <orogor> .. without access to the gui

11:18 <floflobel> hi, i need to replace the favicon on my wiki. I follow the wiki http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/How+do+I+add+a+favicon+for+my+wiki. I have imported other favicon by renaming them and i looked on my browser by emptying the cache but the icon isn't modified.. I have try to replace favicon in the folder ../resources/icons/xwiki and it worked but I would use the wiki method.
